languages.text: "Но, Лорд-капитан... как мне еще обращаться к вам? Я больше не подданная фон Валанциус. Я больше не служу вам. Вы — {name}, и этого довольно. Не судите строго, но я не хочу возвращаться к тому, что было. Довольно".

"But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."
languages.original_text: "Но, Лорд-капитан... как мне еще обращаться к вам? Я больше не подданная фон Валанциус. Я больше не служу вам. Вы — {name}, и этого довольно. Не судите строго, но я не хочу возвращаться к тому, что было. Довольно".

traits.locale_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."

traits.locale_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."

traits.locale_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ですがロード・キャプテン…他にどう話せと？私はもうフォン・ヴァランシウスの臣下ではないし、あなたにももう仕えていない。あなたは{name}、それ以上でも以下でもない。あまり厳しい批判はしないでほしい。以前のようには戻りたくない。もうたくさん」
languages.original_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."

traits.locale_text: 「ですがロード・キャプテン…他にどう話せと？私はもうフォン・ヴァランシウスの臣下ではないし、あなたにももう仕えていない。あなたは{name}、それ以上でも以下でもない。あまり厳しい批判はしないでほしい。以前のようには戻りたくない。もうたくさん」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “可是，舰长大人……不然我还能怎么称呼你呢？我已经不再是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的臣民了，也不再为你服务了。你是{name}，就是这样。请不要太苛刻地评价我，但我不想再回到原来的样子了，我受够了。”
languages.original_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."

traits.locale_text: “可是，舰长大人……不然我还能怎么称呼你呢？我已经不再是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的臣民了，也不再为你服务了。你是{name}，就是这样。请不要太苛刻地评价我，但我不想再回到原来的样子了，我受够了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Pero, Lord Capitán... ¿cómo si no me dirijo a usted? Ya no soy súbdita de los von Valancius. Ya no estoy a su servicio. Es {name} y nada más. Le ruego que no me juzgue con mucha severidad, pero no quiero volver a la misma situación de antes. Ya he tenido suficiente».
languages.original_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."

traits.locale_text: «Pero, Lord Capitán... ¿cómo si no me dirijo a usted? Ya no soy súbdita de los von Valancius. Ya no estoy a su servicio. Es {name} y nada más. Le ruego que no me juzgue con mucha severidad, pero no quiero volver a la misma situación de antes. Ya he tenido suficiente».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Aber Lord Captain ... Wie soll ich Euch sonst ansprechen? Ich bin kein Valancius-Untertan mehr. Ich diene Euch nicht mehr. Ihr seid {name}, mehr nicht. Bitte urteilt nicht zu hart über mich, aber ich will nicht, dass es wieder wie früher wird. Ich habe genug."
languages.original_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."

traits.locale_text: "Aber Lord Captain ... Wie soll ich Euch sonst ansprechen? Ich bin kein Valancius-Untertan mehr. Ich diene Euch nicht mehr. Ihr seid {name}, mehr nicht. Bitte urteilt nicht zu hart über mich, aber ich will nicht, dass es wieder wie früher wird. Ich habe genug."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Mais, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Comment voulez-vous que je vous appelle ? Je ne suis plus un sujet des von Valancius. Je ne suis plus à votre service. Vous êtes {name}, et c'est tout. Ne m'en voulez pas, mais je ne veux pas que les choses redeviennent comme avant. J'ai eu ma dose. »
languages.original_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."

traits.locale_text: « Mais, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Comment voulez-vous que je vous appelle ? Je ne suis plus un sujet des von Valancius. Je ne suis plus à votre service. Vous êtes {name}, et c'est tout. Ne m'en voulez pas, mais je ne veux pas que les choses redeviennent comme avant. J'ai eu ma dose. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "İyi de Lord Kaptan... Sana başka nasıl hitap edebilirim ki? Artık von Valancius kulu değilim. Artık sana hizmet etmiyorum. Sana ancak {name} diyebilirim. Lütfen insaflı ol çünkü eski hâlime dönmek istemiyorum. O günler bana yetti."
languages.original_text: "But, Lord Captain... How else should I address you? I'm no longer a von Valancius subject. I don't serve you anymore. You're {name}, and that's that. Please don't judge me too harshly, but I don't want to go back to how things were. I've had enough."

traits.locale_text: "İyi de Lord Kaptan... Sana başka nasıl hitap edebilirim ki? Artık von Valancius kullarından biri değilim. Artık sana hizmet etmiyorum. Sana ancak {name} diyebilirim. Lütfen yargılarken insaflı ol çünkü eski hâlime dönmek istemiyorum. Yetti bana."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
